about.title: About
about.description: is a 501c3 nonprofit organization dedicated to embracing and supporting dependent visa holders, especially women, by helping them build connections, access essential resources, and feel valued in their new communities.
about.mission: Together, we create a bridge towards independence and belonging.

support.title: We are here to support, uplift, and guide
support.description: At We Independent, we are committed to empowering dependent visa holders by providing support across 4 key areas to help them thrive in their new environment
